name: I Made Decisions
description:
Spells of power have always been found on simple things.

From bits of scrolls, or painted rocks, to even maybe a child's sticker book.

The most powerful spells only need true intentions to work.

LudumDare 32 Entry by Lamphj.

Controls WASD or Arrow Keys to move. Space bar to place a sticker.

HTML5 can be found here
